text: 89mm from Europe () is a 1993 Polish short documentary film directed by Marcel Łoziński,Docufest 1995|International Documentary Association looking at the 89 mm difference in track gauge between Russian and European railroads after the Cold War.MUBI It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.`FORREST GUMP' NAILS DOWN 13 OSCAR NOMINATIONS - Desert News ==Accolades== *Academy Award for Best Documentary (Short Subject) nomination Documentary Winners: 1995 Oscars *European Film Award for Best Documentary Special Mention European Film Academy : European Film Awards Winners 1993 ==References== ==External links== * * 89mm from Europe at Studio Filmowe Kalejdoskop * , posted by Fokus TV Category:1990s short documentary films Category:1993 films Category:1993 independent films Category:Polish films Category:Russian-language films Category:Polish documentary films Category:Polish independent films Category:Polish black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Marcel Lozinski Category:Polish short films Category:Documentary films about rail transport Category:Track gauges Category:Rail transport in Russia Category:1520 mm gauge railways
title: 89mm from Europe
